# Project

## Purpose
Constitutional AI-first development framework for Claude Code. Provides specialized agents, workflow skills, and lifecycle hooks that enforce quality gates, scenario-driven development, and empirical validation across any project.

## Domain
- Skill: self-contained workflow command (SKILL.md + references/ + templates/ + scripts/)
- Hook: lifecycle automation trigger (Python/Shell, registered in hooks.json)
- Ralph: stateful multi-step orchestrator with resume capability and safety nets
- SDD reference: https://factory.strongdm.ai/
